title: Mountains of memories : Digital Storytelling project

abstract: Four stories from people with a deep connection to the Victorian Alpine Country.
description: Four stories from people with a deep connection to the Victorian Alpine Country. From different backgrounds, they share their experiences of working, living and travelling to the Alpine country, the stories of ancestors who have mined and lived in the region and how the Alpine country has left an indeliable impression on their lives.
